text: Cirò is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Crotone in the Italian region Calabria. It is about North of Crotone. As of 2004 about 2,467 people lived there. It has an area of .All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute Istat. Caselle Landi borders the following municipalities: Carfizzi, Cirò Marina, Crucoli, Melissa and Umbriatico. == Notable people == * Nicodemo Gentile (1969) Lawyer ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Settlements in Crotone
title: Cirò
